lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Although the senators said Baldrige told them no decision would be taken until a final determination is made on whether Japanese microchips were dumped in the United States, they said they were virtually sure Japan would face penalties.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The semiconductor industry produces microprocessor chips which are used in high technology products ranging from radios to defence missile guidance systems.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The United States will likely impose sanctions soon on imports of Japanese microchips, senators said today after a private meeting with Commerce Secretary Malcolm Baldrige.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Although the senators said Baldrige told them no decision would be taken until a final determination is made on whether Japanese microchips were dumped in the United States, they said they were virtually sure Japan would face penalties.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The semiconductor industry produces microprocessor chips which are used in high technology products ranging from radios to defence missile guidance systems.

lst.name: sentence
